intro: Welcome to block party puzzle game, offering a relaxing yet challenging experience for all ages.
description:
Block Party DX! is a block puzzle game with an exciting twist—you have full control of where the blocks go! It’s a popular choice for casual play while providing a fun mental challenge.

The goal is simple yet engaging: match and clear as many colored blocks as possible on the board. Mastering the skill of filling rows or columns makes the game easier, while creating multiple combos helps you climb the leaderboards.

Block Party DX! offers a relaxing and cozy puzzle experience that also keeps your mind active and sharp.

Three Addictive Game Modes:
★ Party Block Puzzle: over 999 levels with varying objectives to meet, clear a level by score or color blocks (8x8 - 12x12).
★ Time Block Puzzle: Start with 300 seconds and aim for highest scores (8x8).
★ Classic Block Puzzle: Drag, drop blocks to clear lines (8x8).


Whether you’re tackling the endless challenges of Classic mode, unleashing powerful Block Blasts, or strategically placing pieces for maximum impact, the excitement never ends. Enjoy intuitive gameplay and captivating visuals.

Features:
★ Nintendo Switch™ online leaderboards for each mode. (players can opt-out)
★ 18 professionally crafted background tracks.  
★ Multiple language support.  
★ Daily free spin for gold coins.
★ Rescue games using coins.  
★ Fully controller, or touch screen support.
★ Toggle sound and music on/off.  

With simple controls, fantastic sound effects, and a great rhythm, Block Party DX! is a game you’ll keep coming back to!

Block Party DX! provides a truly immersive experience for puzzle lovers of all ages. Are you ready to tackle the ultimate block challenge and aim for the world championship?
